snippet: After bouncing around the waiver wire, Chris Schwinden hopes his return to the Mets organization will last.
abstract: New York Mets minor league pitcher Chris Schwinden has bounced around major and minor league teams since being drafted in 2008; hopes to be called up by the Mets when rosters expand in September.
lead_paragraph: After bouncing around the waiver wire, Chris Schwinden hopes his return to the Mets organization will last.

headline.seo: Schwinden Returns to Mets After Bouncing Around Waiver Wire
headline.main: A Long Road Home, With Further Still to Go
headline.print_headline: A Long Road Home, With Further Still to Go
